transcript: And last year, I remember distinctive that you said you were so excited to get here that you don't remember that you stubbed your toe into the car.

segments.text: And last year, I remember distinctive that you said you were so excited to get here that
you don't remember that you stubbed your toe into the car.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: And last year, I remember distinctly you said, you were so excited to get here that you don't remember you stubbed your toe until we were in the car.
